text: My team designs, builds
and deploys the products

that help our customers make
better decisions about giving
patient care in the post-acute care space.
Generative AI is extremely important to us

because our customers
have come to count on us

to be forward thinking
in the way we design
and deploy products to market.

So by embracing generative AI,
we have allowed our customers
to make better informed

and faster decisions on
providing patient care.

We've chosen AWS Bedrock as
our ultimate product to use
for our generative AI interface

because it's simply the
best product in the market.

The reason having our data on
AWS has been helpful in being
successful with generative AI is

that now we have a one-stop
shop where we can do all
of our core development

and we can access a variety
of different, very powerful

and very capable Generative AI
models all in the same place.
And we have the expertise

and the support of the
AWS generative AI team,

and we can switch between
models very easily

with a very clean, easy
to understand interface.

Our company's vision regarding
generative AI is to continue
to innovate and grow using generative AI
to empower better patient care.

Anthropic on Bedrock is really
like a five star buffet
of generative AI models.
We chose the Anthropic Claude models

because Claude is better
than the other widely

adopted AI models and beats
them in most benchmarks.
Claude has a much better context window
and it has exceptional processing speed.

We're using Claude at Forcura
to drive our core use case,

which is summarization of vast
amounts of disparate data.
The main benefits we're experiencing
by using Claude's models is that
as the Claude models continue to grow
and improve, which they do regularly,

our capabilities continue
to grow and improve.

Using Claude through Bedrock
also means that we can switch
between the Claude family

of models very readily
based on our business needs.

A real world example of how
we're affecting patient care
with generative AI is the product

that we've just recently launched
in collaboration with AWS,
which is the Forcura Referral Summary.

The Forcura Referral Summary
brings together the most
important information about the patient
and the referral. Information

that could be spread
across hundreds of pages

is now presented in one
single concise summary.
So this allows our clients
to focus on just giving good patient care
and making fast decisions.
And using Bedrock, we were able
to focus on just building product
and solving the business problem instead
of building infrastructure
and creating abstractions to a bunch
of different generative AI models.

The meaning of this
particular product launch

in generative AI for our
customers has been profound in
that our customers have called this launch
and our product life changing,
and that it gives our customers access

to critical information that
allows them to make faster
and better informed decisions

that lets them provide
better patient care.
